name: Klonoa's Instructions To Do Stuff
description:
Well, it took me awhile to make this mod (1 Month and Almost 2 Weeks) Mostly because I was kinda lazy....

________________________________

You know, there has been quite alot of mods based of all sorts of characters from all sorts of franchises, like Kirby's Basics, Wario's Basics,  Donald Duck's Basics, Cutman's Clues, Garfelf's Guide, Freddy's Basics, Mr. Bean's Basics, and so on. But,

Theirs never been a mod about Klonoa nor have him featured in one (I think). So, I made one lol.

Story: WARNING: Use of Swearing and Earrape. If you don't like these then don't play the mod. Klonoa is Created/Owned by Namco Baldi's Basics is Created/Owned by Mystman12/Basically Games And all credits goes to the owners of everything  that I used in this mod (Sounds, Music, Characters, Etc) ________________________________

Original Game:

https://basically-games.itch.io/baldis-basics
